name: Gateway Hotel at Akota Gardens Vadodara

reviews.text: The hotel was recommended by the firm I was visiting in Vadodara.
reviews.title: Decent Choice for Vadodara

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I arrived at the hotel around 6:00 pm, but I was told my room was not ready, and I had to wait for about 15 minutes in the lobby. They offered something to drink while I waited.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: The room and bathroom was spacious, and there was a balcony with a table and a couple of chairs. I didn't use it at all because there were so many bird droppings...
reviews.title: Nice hotel

reviews.text: The wireless internet service was available but during the evening hours I was not able to get connected and stay connected at all. In the early morning hours, there were no problems.
reviews.title: No problemo! Very nice hotel!!

reviews.text: They have a fitness center with a few cardio equipment and weight machines, and steam room.
reviews.title: Modern, efficient hotel
